comments:
perforce plugins (p4eclipse from p4eclipse.sourceforge.net and P4WSAD from 
perforce.com) stopped working in version 3.0. Both plugins work in version 2.x.
x.

The following is an error log generated when trying to connect to perforce 
server using P4WSAD plugin.
